name: Gravitum (POLE 3D)
description:
Gravitum is a 2D platformer where you will control a sub-atomic particle traveling in the infinitely small. Move from atom to atom using gravity and try to make your way between the obstacles of this unforgiving quantum universe.

Go through the six levels of the game and try to collect all the collectibles.

The project has been made by a team of 5 students during 3 months.

Gravitum has been made by :

Martin Calujek - Lead game designer / Game artist / Level designer

Guillaume Lefebvre - Developper

Louis Remy - Game designer / Level designer

Charles Rouvres - Game designer / Sound designer

Livine Sigier - Developper

2019/2020

Xbox controller is required.
